name: SliceShow

aliases.name: SliceShow
aliases.comment: SliceShow app, exposes html signal and tasks signal
aliases.type: { html : Signal.Signal Html.Html , tasks : Signal.Signal (Task.Task Effects.Never ()) }

values.name: init
values.comment: Init Model from list of slides

values.name: setDimensions
values.comment: Set initial dimensions taken from port

values.name: setHash
values.comment: Set initial hash taken from port

values.name: show
values.comment:
Start the SliceShow with your `slides`:
    app = show (init slides)
    main = app.html
    port tasks : Signal (Task.Task Never ())
    port tasks = app.tasks

name: SliceShow.Slide
comment:
This module helps you define a slide
@docs Slide, slide

values.name: slide
values.comment: Create new slide from a list of content items

name: SliceShow.Content
comment:
This module helps you define Slide content
@docs Content, item, container, hide
